metadataAttributes.Title: Certified ScrumMaster® (CSM) Certification Training Course
metadataAttributes.Short Intro: Move up the career ladder by earning the prestigious Certified ScrumMaster® certification. Prepare for the Scrum Master certification through this 2-day CSM training course by Simplilearn. It is an exhaustive, instructor-led Scrum master certification course that introduces you to all major concepts of the Scrum framework required for Agile Project Management.
